result.eng: Do you have respect for the police?
result.ga: an bhfuil meas agat ar na gardaí
result.orig: an bhfuil meas agat ar na gardaí
result.html: an bhfuil meas agat ar na gardaíDo you have respect for the police?
result.ponchtml: an ḃfuil meas agat ar na gardaíDo you have respect for the police?

result.eng: He threw a brick at the police.
result.ga: chaith sé bríce leis na poilíní
result.orig: chaith sé bríce leis na poilíní
result.html: chaith sé bríce leis na poilíníHe threw a brick at the police.
result.ponchtml: ċaiṫ sé bríce leis na poilíníHe threw a brick at the police.

result.ga: cuirfidh mé glaoch ar na gardaí
result.orig: cuirfidh mé glaoch ar na gardaí
result.html: cuirfidh mé glaoch ar na gardaíI'll call the police.
result.ponchtml: cuirfiḋ mé glaoċ ar na gardaíI'll call the police.

result.html: ghabh na póilíní méThe police arrested me.
result.ponchtml: ġaḃ na póilíní méThe police arrested me.

result.html: ghlaoigh sí ar na gardaíShe called the police.
result.ponchtml: ġlaoiġ sí ar na gardaíShe called the police.

result.eng: He is a member of the police.
result.ga: is ball den gharda síochána é
result.orig: is ball den gharda síochána é
result.html: is ball den gharda síochána éHe is a member of the police.
result.ponchtml: is ball den ġarda síoċána éHe is a member of the police.

result.eng: It is not appropriate for the police to ask me such questions.
result.ga: ní cóir do na póilíní ceisteanna mar seo a chur orm
result.orig: ní cóir do na póilíní ceisteanna mar seo a chur orm
result.html: ní cóir do na póilíní ceisteanna mar seo a chur ormIt is not appropriate for the police to ask me such questions.
result.ponchtml: ní cóir do na póilíní ceisteanna mar seo a ċur ormIt is not appropriate for the police to ask me such questions.
